About BV Pet

BV is continuously improving and evolving for our customer needs.

Our goal is your satisfaction.

BV Training Pads for Dogs and Puppies

BV Pet waste management and dog behavior training product.

We are helping you to maintain your home a pleasant and clean environment for your pets.

Super Absorbent Core.

Heavy duty super absorbent core turns urine to gel – locks the liquid in the middle layers – to eliminate stains and odors quickly.

High Quality Top Layer.

Flash-dry technology designed to dry the surface quickly.

Leak-Proof.

The bottom layer is made of PE plastic material. It can protect your carpet and floor from leaking.

(as of Nov 30,2022 08:32:51 UTC – Details)



Extra Large Size: 24 inches tall, amazing size, conspicuous and impressive.
Package Included: 5 Pcs Christmas yard signs – Ginch, Whoville Pole, Cindy Lou Who, Max, Gift Box, Ginch and Whoville Pole are respectively composed of two pieces. Lovely and unique design is really suitable for Christmas decorations outdoor.
Shining at Night: This Christmas yard sign comes with two 13ft long LED colorful light strings, can twining round the yard signs to emit brilliant lights at night. The battery box is not waterproof and needs to be shielded when used outdoors on rainy days, giving you a beautiful night.The string lights use 3 AA batteries, can last 60-100H.
High-Quality Material: This Grinch yard signs are made of thickened corrugated cardboard, which is waterproof and environmentally friendly.
Easy to Assemble: This Christmas lawn decorations kit contains 4Pcs 6’’ plastic stakes, 6Pcs 12’’ plastic stakes, 2Pcs H-shaped support. You only need to use short stake to assemble Ginch sign and Whoville Pole together, and then use H-shaped support to fix Ginch and Whoville Pole on the lawn. Cindy Lou Who, Max and Gift Box respectively use two 12 inch plastic stakes to insert on the lawn. It’s very easy to assemble the outdoor decoration for Christmas!
Various Applications: The Xmas yard sign go extremely well with the Christmas lawn and yard decorations. You may place them in your lawn to make your Christmas merry and leave your guests and family with fascinating and enduring holiday memories.
Customer Service: If you have any ideas or suggestions about our products and services, please contact us and rest assured that we will satisfy you.

BIG Button Phone – Packard Bell creates goods for everyone, including senior citizens. We work hard to ensure our product is 100% all the time, keeping the family safe we manufactured a big button phone for your parents and grandparents so they can make calls and receive calls at ease.
Speed Dial – With just one touch of a button you can call your loved ones, set up to 10 people on speed dial and always have the most important people just one click away
Enhanced Speaker Phone – For those who are hard of hearing you can now hear everything loud and clear. The big button phone has a speaker enhancing the call volume for those who are hard of hearing.
Works in Power Outage – The Big button phone will always be there for you, no matter the weather or any electricity problems the phone will remain on and ready to call allowing you to tell your family you’re safe.
Excellent Care – Packard Bell takes responsibility of all quality-related issues. Please feel free to contact our customer support team when you have any question, and you can be sure of our prompt response.

Samsung Galaxy A22 5G mobile was launched on 2nd June 2021. The phone comes with a 6.60-inch touchscreen display. Samsung Galaxy A22 5G is powered by an octa-core processor. It comes with 4GB of RAM. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G runs Android 11 and is powered by a 5000mAh battery. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G supports proprietary fast charging. As far as the cameras are concerned, the Samsung Galaxy A22 5G on the rear packs a triple camera setup featuring a 48-megapixel primary camera with an f/1.8 aperture; a 5-megapixel camera with an f/2.2 aperture; a 2-megapixel camera, and a 2-megapixel camera with an f/2.4 aperture. The rear camera setup has autofocus. It has a single front camera setup for selfies, featuring an 8-megapixel sensor with an f/2.0 aperture. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G runs One UI Core 3.1 is based on Android 11 and packs 64GB of inbuilt storage (up to 1000GB). The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G is a dual-SIM (GSM) mobile that accepts Nano-SIM mobile. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G measures 167.20 x 76.40 x 9.00mm (height x width x thickness) and weighs 203.00 grams. It was launched in Grey, Mint, and Violet color. Connectivity options on the Samsung Galaxy A22 5G include Wi-Fi, GPS, USB Type-C, 3G, and 4G (with support for Band 40 used by some LTE networks in India). Sensors on the phone include accelerometer, ambient light sensor, proximity sensor, and fingerprint sensor.
128GB ROM, 4GB RAM, Expandable MicroSD, MediaTek MT6833 Dimensity 700 5G (7 nm), Octa-core, Mali-G57 MC2
Dual-SIM (GSM) mobile that accepts Nano-SIM mobile. Rear Camera: 48MP, F1.8 + 5MP, F2.2 + 2MP, F2.4 (depth), Front Camera: 8MP, F2.0
2G Bands: 850, 900, 1800, 1900MHz, 3G Bands: 850, 900, 1700, 1900, 4G LTE Bands: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 12, 17, 20, 26, 28, 38, 40, 41 , 66
5G Bands: N1(2100), N3(1800), N5(850), N7(2600), N8(900), N20(800), N28(700), N66(AWS-3) N38(2600), N40(2300), N41(2500), N78(3500). May not get 5G as it is not available in all regions. Please check with your carrier for compatible 5G Bands.
International Model compatible with Most GSM Carriers in US and Global like T-Mobile, AT&T, MetroPCS, etc. Will NOT work with CDMA Carriers Such as Verizon, Sprint.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);

var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);

var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);

var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,

offlineYear,

Price: $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:11:11 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Next Generation Garden Hoses!

Out with the old clumsy, kinking garden hose! The Joey’s garden hose features the latest in garden hose innovation. Inner latex core and outer elasticized fabric work together to form the ultimate garden hose. The Joeys Garden hose expands up to 3x its original size using standard water pressure and will shrink back to size when pressure is turned off. Superbly flexible, the hose will not kink or twist.

Our Garden Hose Features: Solid Brass Connectors Fits Any Standard Spigot 8 Pattern Hose Spray Nozzle Expandable Up To 3X Available in 4 Sizes

Hose Spray Nozzle Included

Included with every Joey’s garden hose is a hose spray nozzle. 8 patterns include vertical, flat, center, stream, mist, soaker, shower and cone patterns! Featuring a rubber handle, the nozzle is easy to grip.

Solid Brass Connectors

Our hoses are finished off with solid brass connectors to ensure an easy and secure fit with any standard spigot. Connectors will not warp or rust.

Expandable up to 3X

Featuring the latest in hose engineering, hour garden hose can stretch up to 3x using standard hose pressure. When pressure is turned off the hose will immediately shrink back to its original size.

Expandable up to 3X its size- Our garden hose can expand up to 3x under standard water pressure and then immediately shrink back to its original size for easy storage.
Solid Brass Connectors- Each hose is tipped with solid brass connectors to ensure the hose can screw on easily to any standard spigot.
Hose Spray Nozzle Included- 8 pattern hose spray nozzle has a rubber handle for easy grip.

Official World Chess Championship set is the set produced in plastic chess set in exactly the same design as the famous wooden Official World Chess Championship set that is used in the World Chess Championship matches and Grand Prix the most beatiful in chess sets. The weight of the chess board set is 1.2 kilos, the weighted chess pieces only is 553 grams, white and black color, best tournament chess set for your game! Unique and designed set comes with a high-quality cardboard chess board, square size is 48 mm. The chess kit is ideal for beginners, kids, adults for all chess fans. It comes in a cute small case with the themed design – cool and edgy inside and out – best chess gifts for your kids. Since 2013, the sets in this design have been exclusively used in the World Chess Championship matches and top international events. The set premiered at the famous 2013 Candidates Tournament in London where the current champion Magnus Carlsen won his ticket to the Championship Match on tie-breaks. Chess set official has a folding regulation chess board and black and white chess pieces weighted in a gift box. If you don’t have a chess set at home, there are lots of options out there, so we aimed to create the ultimate chessboard and set for home and club use that should cover all types of chess play. The box with a magnetic latch comfortably stores the pieces and the foldable. Just as it has changed the way we work and socialize, the pandemic has likely made you change the way we play chess. You, just like us, probably ditched the open tournaments and club events (even if they are happening in your area) for some online chess action. With more time at home, you are possibly playing chess a bit more than before, and using your chessboard to set up positions to be able to analyze them in 3D. One of the best chess sets portable and chess sets for beginners.
CLASSIC CHESS SET with new staunton design with chess pieces and chess board. Ideal for Christmas and birthday gift for chess lovers. Official World Chess Championship set is the set produced in plastic chess set in exactly the same design as the famous wooden Official World Chess Championship set that is used in the World Chess Championship matches and Grand Prix the most beatiful in chess sets. The weight of the chess board set is 1.2 kilos, the weighted chess pieces only is 553 grams, white and black color, best tournament chess set for your game! Unique and designed set comes with a high-quality cardboard chess board, square size is 48 mm. The chess kit is ideal for beginners, kids, adults for all chess fans. It comes in a cute small case with the themed design – cool and edgy inside and out – best chess gifts for your kids. Since 2013, the sets in this design have been exclusively used in the World Chess Championship matches and top international events. The set premiered at the famous 2013 Candidates Tournament in London where the current champion Magnus Carlsen won his ticket to the Championship Match on tie-breaks. Chess set official has a folding regulation chess board and black and white chess pieces weighted in a gift box. If you don’t have a chess set at home, there are lots of options out there, so we aimed to create the ultimate chessboard and set for home and club use that should cover all types of chess play. The box with a magnetic latch comfortably stores the pieces and the foldable. Just as it has changed the way we work and socialize, the pandemic has likely made you change the way we play chess. You, just like us, probably ditched the open tournaments and club events (even if they are happening in your area) for some online chess action. With more time at home, you are possibly playing chess a bit more than before, and using your chessboard to set up positions to be able to analyze them in 3D. One of the best chess sets portable and chess sets for beginners.
CLASSIC CHESS SET with new staunton design with chess pieces and chess board. Ideal for Christmas and birthday gift for chess lovers. GREAT CHOICE FOR YOUR PETS – IMMCUTE Pet Training and Puppy PadsA clean and fresh-smelling home that every pet parent and dog deserves. IMMCUTE pet training pads are ideal for puppies and dogs that stay indoors for long periods of time.All-day ProtectionIt can provide all-day protection for the puppy or senior dog potty training, making your cleanup a breeze and saving you much time.Made of High-quality Materials

  • Non-woven Fabrics
  • Tissue Paper
  • Super Absorbent Polymer (SAP)
  • Fluff Pulp
  • Tissue Paper
  • Waterproof Polyethylene (PE Film)

IMMCUTE dog pee pads are made of high-quality materials, more durable than most pet training pads on the market.6-layer ProtectionThe 6-layer protection technology makes it super absorbent and leak-proof to protect your floors or carpets by preventing leaks. And the absorbent polymer layer instantly turns liquid into a gel, preventing tracking, liquid overflow, and bad smell.Multiple UsesThe puppy pads usually placed in pet crates or kennels, pet pad holders, paper boxes, or put under the dog bowl or on the car backseat to keep clean.Not Only for Dogs, But Also for Other PetsOur pee pads/potty pads are oriented to a wide range of animals, not just for dogs but also for other pets, like kittens, cats, rabbits, ducks, guinea pigs, squirrels, etc.Note:

  • Please measure and determine the size you need before purchasing.
  • Please allow 0-0.4″ error due to manual measurement.
  • Always remember to dispose of soiled dog potty pads and replace them as needed.

【SUPER ABSORBENT & THICKER】Thickened wee wee pads for dogs and 6-layer protection design makes our XL dog pee pee pads more absorbent than the most puppy potty pads on the market.
【QUICK-DRYING】Unique flash-dry technology quickly turns liquid into gel, preventing tracking, liquid overflow, and bad smell.
【LEAK-PROOF】Each pet training pad features a plastic backing and border to protect your floors or carpets by blocking leaks for 24 hours.
【ALL DAY PROTECTION】Our puppy pads pet training pads are a great solution for multi-dog homes and pets that need to stay inside for a long period of time.
【XLARGE SIZE】28″ W x 34″ L(71.1cm x 86.4cm).Our magic pee pads are perfect for puppies, senior or sick dogs, kittens, cats, rabbits, ducks and other pets. Not only for your indoor use but also for outdoor use (especially use during travel or the leisure time on the lawn).
